--- !bad_mixed_set_operators.sql
GRAPH g RETURN 1 AS x UNION ALL RETURN 2 AS x INTERSECT ALL RETURN 3 AS x;

--- Error
syntax error: testdata/input/gql/!bad_mixed_set_operators.sql:1:47: all set operator at the same level must be the same
  1|  GRAPH g RETURN 1 AS x UNION ALL RETURN 2 AS x INTERSECT ALL RETURN 3 AS x;
   |                                                ^~~~~~~~~
syntax error: testdata/input/gql/!bad_mixed_set_operators.sql:1:74: expected token: <eof>, but: ;
  1|  GRAPH g RETURN 1 AS x UNION ALL RETURN 2 AS x INTERSECT ALL RETURN 3 AS x;
   |                                                                           ^


--- AST

  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 6,
          NameEnd: 7,
          Name:    "g",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Query: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    Statements: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.BadGQLLinearQueryStatement{
        BadNode: &ast.BadNode{
          NodePos: 8,
          NodeEnd: 73,
          Tokens:  []*token.Token{
            &token.Token{
              Kind:     "<ident>",

--- SQL
GRAPH g RETURN 1 AS x UNION ALL RETURN 2 AS x INTERSECT ALL RETURN 3 AS x
